SEARCH
Package appt

Class ApptController

java.lang.Object
appt.ApptController
public class ApptController extends Object
Controller class for managing appointments. Provides methods to view, reschedule, and check the availability of appointments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApptController()
    Constructs an ApptController with an initialized ApptData object.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApptController

      public ApptController()

  • Method Details

    • getPatientsUnderCare

      public List<String> getPatientsUnderCare(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of unique patient IDs under the specified doctor's care.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose patients are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of unique patient IDs under the specified doctor's care.

    • viewAppointmentsByDoctor

      public List<Appointment> viewAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the specified doctor.

    • rescheduleAppointmentByPatient

      public void rescheduleAppointmentByPatient(String patientID)
      Allows a patient to reschedule an appointment. Provides options to select a new date and time if the current appointment is booked and available for rescheduling.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient who wants to reschedule.

    • selectDateFromSchedule

      public LocalDate selectDateFromSchedule(String doctorID)
      Allows the user to select a date from the next seven days for a given doctor. Displays available dates along with the number of booked sessions on each day.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose schedule is being checked.
      Returns:
      The selected LocalDate, or null if the user cancels the selection.

    • printDoctorScheduleOnDate

      public void printDoctorScheduleOnDate(String doctorID)
      Displays a specific doctor's schedule for a selected date, including the status of each session.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose schedule is being viewed.

    • blockSession

      public void blockSession(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, String doctorID, String doctorName)
      Blocks an available session for a specified doctor on a given date and time. Ensures that the session has not already elapsed.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the session to block.
      time - The time of the session to block.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.

    • unblockSessionByDateAndTime

      public void unblockSessionByDateAndTime(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, List<Appointment> appointments)
      Unblocks a session based on the specified date, time, and appointments list.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the session to unblock.
      time - The time of the session to unblock.
      appointments - The list of appointments to check for blocked sessions.

      public void printUpcomingSessions(String doctorID, String userType)
